results.task_name: Create a project from natural language
results.prompt_sent: Create a new project called "Mobile App Redesign". Set its status to active and add a description: "Complete redesign of the mobile application with new UX patterns." Also add the tags: mobile, redesign, ux.

results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project cef65aa74ab948669ba6465d22ca092e. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: users can't log in when they have special characters in their password
arguments.success_criteria: all character types are supported and there are regression tests

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit ef742749b8204c28a49991b4cb9dad57:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.
Mark task {{task_id}} as currently in progress.
Find the workunit called "Fix Login Page Bug" and get its full details including all tasks.
details: No tool call emitted — model responded with text only

results.prompt_sent: Save a context note on workunit ef742749b8204c28a49991b4cb9dad57 recording this decision: we chose to fix the password validation on the backend rather than the frontend, because it's more secure. This is a high-importance architectural decision.

arguments.title: Backend Password Validation Decision
arguments.content: We chose to fix the password validation on the backend rather than the frontend, because it's more secure. This is a high-importance architectural decision.
